com.github.rholder.fauxflake

Class IdGenerators

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rholder.fauxflake.IdGenerators

  • public abstract class IdGenerators
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a collection of convenience methods for constructing common IdGenerator implementations.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IdGenerator newFlakeIdGenerator()
      Create a Flake-based IdGenerator using the MAC address as the unique machine id.

      Create a Flake-based IdGenerator using the given MachineIdProvider.
      static IdGenerator newSnowflakeIdGenerator()
      Create a Snowflake-based IdGenerator using the MAC address and PID for hashing out a pseudo-unique machine id.
      static IdGenerator newSnowflakeIdGenerator(MachineIdProvider machineIdProvider)
      Create a Snowflake-based IdGenerator using the given MachineIdProvider.
